structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Purchase Of Home Or Income Producing Property
law.text: The department may, after approval by the commissioner, authorize the purchase of a home by a recipient where suitable public or private rental accommodations cannot be found. The department shall have a lien on the property so purchased to the extent of assistance granted toward the purchase of such home. In no event shall such authorization be given for the purchase of income producing property.
